goal.en: Figure out some angles on World Cultural products. KPop. Russians. State Sponsored Murder.
goal.ch: What is World Literature? Other nations making cultural products that are not boring.

content.en: “First hour puppet, second hour world view presented, third hour short writing explication.“
content.ch: “First hour work on my puppet book, The Secret Life of Puppets. Second hour try and catch some world being presented. Third hour explicating, writing our discoveries.“

textbook.en: Secret Life of Puppets. ETA Hoffman.

grading.en: “In class writing, midterm paper, final paper.“
grading.ch: “In class writing, midterm paper, final paper.“

flex_desc.en: Use final weeks to complete paper.
flex_desc.ch: Use final weeks to complete paper.

en.competency: English critical reading and analytical writing
English oral communication and cultural crossing

ch.competency: 英文閱讀解析與寫作論述
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現
作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現
